confirmation.subject: Request confirmation
confirmation.bodyLine2: Your help request has been published and will be seen by volunteers based on your provided location. We will send you an email as soon as somebody can help. You can track your request here:
confirmation.socialMediaReference: The more people now about us, the more we can help. Support us in our mission and help spread the word!
confirmation.closingLine: Stay home, stay healthy and always wash your hands!

helpNotification.subject: Somebody offered help!
helpNotification.introLine: Hi citizen! Someone has seen your request and offers to help. See his/her message below:
helpNotification.closingLine: Stay home, stay healthy and always wash your hands!

emailSubscriptionConfirmation.subject: You rock!
emailSubscriptionConfirmation.bodyLine1: We added you to the local watchlist
emailSubscriptionConfirmation.bodyLine2: If someone in your vicinity will need help, we will notify you immediately. Thank you for offering your support!
emailSubscriptionConfirmation.socialMediaReference: The more people now about us, the more we can help. Support us in our mission and help spread the word!
emailSubscriptionConfirmation.closingLine: Stay home, stay healthy and always wash your hands!

notifySubscribersOnHelp.subject: Time to help
notifySubscribersOnHelp.bodyLine1: We just received a new help request in your area
notifySubscribersOnHelp.bodyLine2: Someone in your vicinity needs help! Click on the button to see details:
notifySubscribersOnHelp.socialMediaReference: The more people now about us, the more we can help. Support us in our mission and help spread the word!
notifySubscribersOnHelp.closingLine: Stay home, stay healthy and always wash your hands!
